reviewText: Mixed feelings on this one, "One step beyond" is almost worth it by itself. The crowd goes nuts (pun intended), but then its a bit downhill from there. The extra's are kind of weak, but decent enough for fans of the music.

I was at this gig and it was wonderful being there Madness are a British institution since the day they first appeared on a stage.

Everything they do is musically very clever with the "hint of Ska" and London accents galore.

This DVD reminds me of parts of the show I missed due to over indulgence!

Watch out for Norton Folgate and whatever the guys are doing now

David
[..]
